description: This file defines the main App component for a Lightning.js-based quiz application. It imports external components, sets up routing to different pages (Intro, Quiz, Results), and manages the application's overall structure and theme.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the application's state with the background color from the theme.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Defines and returns the components used within the App, specifically the Router with its route configuration.
